data.actual_result: Following the steps can result into a flaw in the system which doesn't re-roll the language.
data.expected_result: In this case once a user deselects "Sync Across Clients" the language should reset to original.
data.short_description: If you sync a language to your browser then un-sync the original language does not reset.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open "User Settings" - Go to "Language" - Enable "Sync Across Clients" - Select a language different from English. (On both phone and desktop it should update) - Deselect "Sync Across Clients" (Go check Desktop it should stay as the synced language even after restarting)
